sentences.en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: an empire stretching from Syria to Spain
sentences.cn: 版图从叙利亚一直延伸到西班牙的帝国

sentences.en: Ernest twice ran away from home.
sentences.cn: 欧内斯特两次离家出走。

sentences.en: From now on, I will only be working in the mornings.
sentences.cn: 从现在起，我只在上午上班。

sentences.en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
sentences.cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: He’ll be here tomorrow from about seven o’clock onwards.
sentences.cn: 明天大约7点钟以后他会在这里。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: His head was swathed in bandages made from a torn sheet.
sentences.cn: 他的头上缠满了一层层用床单撕成的绷带。

sentences.en: housewives who work from morning to night
sentences.cn: 从早忙到晚的家庭主妇

sentences.en: How do you get from here to Colchester?
sentences.cn: 从这里到科尔切斯特怎么走？

sentences.en: I got quite a lot of ribbing from my team-mates.
sentences.cn: 队友们经常开我的玩笑。

sentences.en: I'm from Italy.
sentences.cn: 我是意大利人。

sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses.
sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

sentences.en: The carpet was a wedding present from the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这张地毯是首相送的结婚礼物。

sentences.en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentences.cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

sentences.en: The final word will still come from the Secretary of State.
sentences.cn: 最后仍然要由国务卿来定夺。

sentences.en: The hotel is on the main road from Newport.
sentences.cn: 宾馆位于从纽波特出来的主路上。

sentences.en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentences.cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.
sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.

sentences.en: they were friends from that day on.
sentences.cn: 从那天起他们成了朋友。

sentences.en: They were taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入大量烟尘被送往医院。

sentences.en: translating from French into English
sentences.cn: 从法语翻译成英语

sentences.en: We’re going to tell her on her birthday – that’s two weeks from today.
sentences.cn: 我们打算在她生日那天告诉她——离今天还有两个星期。

sentences.en: When she arrived, things just went from bad to worse (= got even worse ) !
sentences.cn: 她到了之后情况简直越来越糟！

phrases.phrase: from day to day (或 hour to hour etc.)
phrases.tran_cn: 每天（或每小时等）；一天一天地（或一小时一小时地等）

phrases.phrase: from now (或 then 等) on

trans.tran_cn: （表示时间）从…，（表示原因）因为，（表示来源）来自…，（表示分离）与…分离[隔开]
trans.tran_en: used to show what the origin of sb/sth is
